Name: 100 California St
Location: Ground level exterior open space in the form of plazas and walkways
Description: This is a large plaza with planter boxes, along with smaller spaces along Davis Street. There is also space for food service to serve the plaza in the future.
Seating_Description: 16 movable chairs, 4 tables, 52' of bench seating

Name: 1 Bush Street
Description: This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.
Seating_Description: None besides steps.
Landscaping_Description: Willow Trees and planting. Interseting architectural design

Name: 555 Mission St
Location: Western side of Building, street level.
Description: This large plaza has several art and landscaping features. It is located in front of 555 Mission Streets and runs along the west side of the building. There are several distinct sitting areas with different styles of seating.
Seating_Description: 100 linear seats and benches.

Name: Crocker Galleria
Location: Third floor of shopping center, down dark hallway.
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: 24 benches measuring 7'8"
Signage_Description: Sign in interior atrium only says "roof garden"
Landscaping_Description: 8 large planter with trees, shrubbery around edge planters.

Name: 250 Howard
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: 600 California St
Location: Northwest side of building, up the stairs from California Street beyond an artistic gateway.
Description: A shady open space area with art in the form of sculptures. This snippet found on the northwest side of the building, up the stairs. It adjoins the open space of the adjacent building.
Seating_Description: 37 seats, 28 are movable.

Name: 120 Howard St
Location: Interior courtyard between the building and the building adjacent to the east
Description: This space features plants along the entirety of the snippet and is served by an espresso cart.
Seating_Description: None.

Name: 525 Market St
Location: Located along Market Street, at the building's side just southwest of main entrance.
Description: This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.
Seating_Description: 168' platform/box seating, 164' terraced steps, ~80 sq. ft. of turf, 11 tables with 44 movable chairs
Landscaping_Description: Plant wall, water feature, abundant street trees, some turf on terraced steps.

Name: 100 Pine St
Description: This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: 611 Folsom St
Description: Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.
Seating_Description: >200' deep brick ledge seating
Landscaping_Description: 7 trees, 6 bushes on sidewalk. Interesting architectural elements and unconventional use of brick.

Name: 180 Howard St
Description: A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.
Seating_Description: 12 linear seats
Landscaping_Description: Trees and wall of planters with tall grass.

Name: 456 Montomery St
Description: This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.
Seating_Description: 72' linear seating, 8 movable chairs and 2 tables

Name: 49 Stevenson St
Location: In front of building on Stevenson Street and through a pedestrianized alley to Jessie Street
Description: This pedestrian walkway has small fountains and an art sculpture are featured in this space. Plaza seating is available for patrons of Yank Sing restaurant only.
Seating_Description: 20 chairs, taken inside before 5pm at time of last site visit.

Name: 50 Beale St
Description: Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.
Seating_Description: 40 bench seats; 100+ linear feet of planter seating
Landscaping_Description: 30+ trees, large open planters, attracts birds

Name: Marriott Courtyard - A (Starbucks)
Location: Bench next to entrance setback 15 feet on 2nd Street.  Per Thayer:  Benches on sidewalk setback on Folsom.
Description: Thayer referenced something that is not part of the open space requirement, this is pedestrian improvement requirement.  Per Thayer:  This open space has benches and landscaping along the sidewalk on Folsom at street level.
Seating_Description: 6 linear seats on two benches along sidewalk
Food_Service_Description: Café across street in hotel lobby
Signage_Description: One next to door of Starbucks. Somewhat removed from the street.
Landscaping_Description: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers

Name: 425 Market St
Description: An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.
Seating_Description: 8 backed benches at 7'8"; 4 6' benches

Name: 200 California St
Type: Public Sitting Area in Pedestrian Walkway
Location: In front of building, sidewalk widening
Description: This pedestrian seating area is on a widened sidewalk. Pedestrians may sit on linear seating that forms a planter box. There is a small, public sculpture next to the planter box.
Seating_Description: 24 linear
Landscaping_Description: planter box. Good diversity and volume of plants

Name: Foundry Square NE
Description: This is one of three plazas fronting the intersection of 1st and Howard, forming Foundary Square. It features art sculptures and seating near a cafe.
Seating_Description: 20 linear seats, 24 movable

Name: 100 1st St
Location: Sun Terrace is on second floor above adjoining parking garage SE of main building. Ground level arcade is on Mission Street side.
Description: The large Sun Terrace features extensive landscaping and seating. Several art sculptures are featured, along with an elevated view of the street below. There is a 'grand' staircase (snippet) up to the Sun Terrace. Ground level arcade in front of building
Seating_Description: 52 movable seats at 10 tables plus numerous areas to sit along built-in benches and planters, grassy areas.
Landscaping_Description: Many trees and plants, water feature, fake grass for sitting.

Name: Gap Building
Description: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.
Seating_Description: 76 seats

Name: Marathon Plaza
Location: In front of building facing Second Street
Description: Large, triangular urban garden facing Second Street with a water feature, ample seating, and lush landscaping. Deli and restaurant open to the park provide food and additional seating.
Seating_Description: 33 tables with 66 movable chairs, >200' bench seating
Landscaping_Description: Real grass lawns, some planters, large water feature

Name: 345 California St - A
Location: Plaza in front of building main entrance.
Description: This open space is provided in the form of a large plaza fronting California Street. Additionally, two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The plaza and east snippet are served by restaurant
Seating_Description: 14 chairs, 5 tables, 50' linear seating

Name: 301 Howard St
Description: Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: Foundry Square NW
Description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.
Seating_Description: 44 linear seating on ledges, 21 seating on planter box, 7 tables 28 chairs

Name: Golden Gate University
Description: Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.
Seating_Description: 200+ ft. of linear bench

Name: 221 Main St
Description: An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.
Seating_Description: 24' of linear seats.

Name: 150 California St
Description: This view terrace is located six stories above the street level. There is a large sculpture, long periods of sunlight, and several types of seating. There are extensive views of the surrounding area.
Seating_Description: 9 tables with 36 movable chairs. ~82 ledge seats
Signage_Description: One at the entrance with directions
Landscaping_Description: Abundant purple plantings, but they take up majority of space. Some tall skinny trees, which provide minimal shade of space definition. Art installation is engaging.

Name: Hampton Inn
Location: Accessible through elevator (check-in at front desk), located at the rooftop.
Description: Rooftop sun and view terrace, with 360 degree views of the city; with limited seating benches.
Seating_Description: Yes- 6 benches, with a capacity of 74 persons, 4 tables.
Landscaping_Description: 6 empty planters, great views of skyline

Name: 211 Main St
Description: Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.
Seating_Description: 50' linear seats.

Name: 55 Second St - C
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: 4 benches (8 seats) along walls of gallery space.
Restrooms_Description: Through main lobby at reception desk (ID required)
Landscaping_Description: A few planters, interesting paving, Art on walls.

Name: 55 Second St - A
Location: Located inside the historic building, up a set of 3-4 steps. Can be accessed through the main lobby (walk past the elevator bay) and through entrances from Jessie and Stevenson Streets.
Description: This large, indoor "park" located inside the historia building has a wooden floor, tables with chairs, and large, comfortable leather chairs on a carpeted section near the large window looking out on Stevenson Street.
Seating_Description: 62 movable chairs and 27 bench seats
Restrooms_Description: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
Special_Amenities_Description: Games: giant Connect4, ping pong, cornhole
Landscaping_Description: Increase in potted plant number and variety

Name: 77 Van Ness Ave
Description: This space is in the front lobby of 77 Van Ness. It has tables and chairs and features a sculpture.
Seating_Description: 3 tables with 9 movable chairs
Signage_Description: One sign on street, facing 90 degrees away from street. Removed in evenings in early mornings

Name: Spear Street Plaza
Location: Outdoor alleyway off of Spear Street
Description: Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.
Seating_Description: Ledges around green spaces and 28 movable chairs around 7 tables.
Landscaping_Description: Diverse grasses, trees, and green wall.

Name: Foundry Square SW (indoor)
Location: Near main building entrance facing the outdoor POPOS.
Description: Indoor park, with art garden, seating, and a café.
Seating_Description: 25 movable seats, 6 tables, 47 linear bench seats

Name: Marriott Courtyard - C
Type: Interior courtyard area - does not appear to be public (see notes)
Description: This space features extensive landscaping with several art attractions. Comfortable seating arrangements are located throughout the space. Food service nearby inside the hotel.
Seating_Description: 42 chairs with tables

Name: 1 Post St
Description: Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: Empire Park
Location: Along commercial street and at 642 commercial st
Description: Empire park, located at 642 Commercial, is an urban garden that features a water fountain and landscaping. Along Commercial in front of Empire park, there are many widened sidewalk spaces which have benches and landscaping.
Seating_Description: 15 chairs w/ tables, 8 bench seats in the park, 8 along commercial.
Food_Service_Description: There is food service serving the commercial street POPOS, but not directly serving that of Empire park.
Signage_Description: Sign is not in compliance, too small, unclear hours, outdated logo.
Landscaping_Description: Water fountain and lots of plants and shade. Diversity of trees.
Accessibility: Direct. Gate at sidewalk open during daylight hours.

Name: 235 Second St
Location: Urban garden: corner of 2nd and Clementina, indoor park ground floor.
Description: This plaza is located on the corner of 2nd St. and Clementina St. It features several types of seating, served by a cafe.
Seating_Description: 42 chairs and 15 tables
Landscaping_Description: Bamboo and street trees protect space from side street, defines space. Indoor park has bushes and interesting paving.
Accessibility: Direct for plaza. Indirect for indoor park

Name: 50 California St
Description: Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.
Seating_Description: 14 movable chairs, 117 linear ft. of bench, another 30' on other side of building
Landscaping_Description: Good tree cover and plantings, define space and provide shade

Name: Foundry Square SE
Description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.
Seating_Description: 44 movable chairs, 45 linear seats on planter boxes sides.

Name: 201 Mission St
Description: Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: 14 Fremont St
Description: This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.
Seating_Description: 13 large tables, 27 small tables, 16 bench seats, 106 movable chairs

Name: 595 Market St
Description: This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.
Seating_Description: Public seating only on stairs. Restaurant dominates space with private seating

Name: 222 2nd St
Description: An enclosed open space, with operable floor to ceiling windows and doors; located within the street-level lobby.
Seating_Description: 63 movable chairs, 15 tables, 300+ linear ft. of seating
Landscaping_Description: No plants, but warm wood walls, striking art.

Name: 101 2nd St
Description: This greenhouse features large trees, windows, and art. It has two levels of space and is served by a cafe.
Seating_Description: 25 linear seats on bench/  ledge. 23 tables, 69 movable chairs
Restrooms_Description: Through main lobby at reception desk (ID required)

Name: 25 Jessie St
Description: This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.
Seating_Description: Ledges around the water feature (>100 linear feet)
Restrooms_Description: Would have had to go through security
Landscaping_Description: Great variety of plants, water feature, elevated planters with tall trees draw eye up

Name: 135 Main St
Location: Located in main lobby waiting area, at building's main entrance.
Description: Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.
Seating_Description: Ample indoor seating: four tables with movable chairs, seven lounge sofas
Landscaping_Description: Waterfall on glass, some white noise effect.

Name: 1 California St
Description: Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.
Seating_Description: 12 tables with 46 non-movable chairs. 38 linear ft. seating

Name: 123 Mission St
Location: plaza in front of the building
Description: This large plaza features extensive landscaping and art. Seperate seating areas with seating characterize the area.
Seating_Description: 122 linear seats

Name: 555/557 Market St
Description: Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.
Seating_Description: No Seating
Landscaping_Description: Diverse plants, grasses, and water feature.

Name: 350 Mission St
Type: Interior open space at ground level, specific type not specified in motion (Greenhouse?)
Description: An enclosed open space, with operable sliding glass doors that open up to street frontage; located within the street-level lobby.
Seating_Description: 35 linear bench seats + amphitheater seating (original estimate at 85 seats total)

Name: Foundry Square SW (outdoor)
Location: Near main building entrance facing the outdoor POPOS.
Description: Street level outdoor plaza with fixed and flexible seating, tables, and maple trees

Name: 181 Fremont
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: ~20 movable seats around 6 tables. Some are high stools and tables, some are lounge seats around coffee tables.
Signage_Description: Code compliant signs on street, in elevator, in space.
Accessibility: Through lobby to 7th floor of building or from Salesforce Park.

Name: Westfield Sky Terrace (Wesfield Center Mall)
Location: Roof top, 9th floor. Accessible by elevator in 835 Market St (only 1st elevator goes to 9th floor).
Description: This extensive 9th floor rooftop space looks onto the dome of the mall and has views westward and sunlight. It does not have direct food service, but food may be found in the food court below in the mall.
Seating_Description: 32 tables, 47 movable chairs, 11 movable cushioned chairs, 15 cushioned bench seats
Landscaping_Description: Wall planters and 15 basic planters. Great views.

Name: 650 California St
Description: This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: Trinity Alley
Location: Within the public right of way
Description: Alley way with ample seating and greenery outside multiple restaurants.
Seating_Description: ~ 50 linear seats with movable tables.
Landscaping_Description: Living plant wall, trees, tall grasses.

Name: Millenium Tower Plaza
Description: This atrium features extensive artwork and is served by a bar/restaurant on the premises. It has various types of seating with tables, and high windows overhead.
Seating_Description: 41 movable chairs and 24 linear seats
Accessibility: Indirect for Atrium. Unknown for Plaza

Name: 345 California St - East B
Location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
Description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B
Seating_Description: 15 chairs, 5 tables, 50' linear seating

Name: Redwood Park
Description: This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.
Seating_Description: 100+ linear seats on boxes, room for 30+ on steps. No movable.
Landscaping_Description: Many redwood trees, diverse ground cover and plantings, flowers, shrubs. Multiple smaller spaces defined within park

Name: Embarcadero Center West 1, 2, & 3
Type: Pedestrian walkway on ground and 2nd levels
Location: Commercial Street between Drumm and Sansome
Description: Commercial Street throughout Embarcadero 1, 2, and 3 is a pedestrian mall on ground floor and 2nd level, which is accessed by an elaborate staircase system, flanked by waterfalls. Fountains, foliage, art work, and bench seating found throughout.
Seating_Description: 30 tables, 107 chairs, plus planter-side seating, benches.

Name: 199 Fremont St
Description: This large plaza space features extensive rock landscaping and artwork. There are two adjoined areas, one of which has food service.
Seating_Description: Rock planter box seating. Approx 114 linear seats plus 17 individual rocks

Name: Marriott Courtyard - B (Starbucks)
Location: Snippet below grade with stair entry on corner of 2nd & Folsom and wheelchair entry on Folsom.
Description: This open space has a small sitting space below street level on the corner of Folsom and Second, served by a café.
Seating_Description: 15 chairs
Signage_Description: One next to door of starbucks. Somewhat removed from the street.
Landscaping_Description: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers

Name: Citygroup Center
Description: Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.
Seating_Description: Ample seating at tables with movable chairs.

Name: 345 California St - West C
Location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
Description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B
Seating_Description: 16 chairs, 5 tables, 50' linear seating

Name: 77 Beale St
Description: Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.
Seating_Description: 200+ linear feet of planter seating, varying heights
Landscaping_Description: 20+ planter trees, open planters, waterfall feature

Name: 1 Kearny St
Description: This rooftop terrace has extensive views of Market St. as well as rooftop architecture of nearby buildings. Landscaping and bench seating support this space.
Seating_Description: 10 6' benches, approximately 20 linear seats
Restrooms_Description: Must present ID to guard in lobby to get bathroom key.
Signage_Description: Three signs: one in front window, one in elevator, and one on rooftop terrace.
Landscaping_Description: Hedges and other types of plants.
Accessibility: Indirect. Must enter lobby, sign in, and take elevator to roof.

Name: 201 Spear St
Description: Plaza with seating along planters.
Seating_Description: NULL

Name: 101 California St
Location: Street level plaza at California and Davis Streets.
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: ~1000 linear ft. of seating on terraced steps, many cushions available
Landscaping_Description: Beautifl terraced seating with abundant plantings

Name: 55 Second St - B
Location: The urban garden is at the end of Anthony street, at the Jessie Street entrance to the building
Description: This space is located outside the rear entry of 55 Second Street. It has planter boxes that serve as seating throughout the plaza.
Seating_Description: Movable furniture removed; only ~100 ft. of planter ledge seating
Restrooms_Description: Located on south side of building
Signage_Description: Embedded within concrete bench next to Jessie Street entrance to historic building
Landscaping_Description: Plants and trees, uses plant wall to shield users from underground parking entrance

Name: 343 Sansome
Location: 15th floor terrace, and on top of the "old office tower" (could be one and the same). Also behind the building Leidesdorff Street, the street is closed during lunch hours
Description: This fifteenth floor open space has excellent views of surrounding buildings and streets, as well as the San Francisco Bay. It has various types of seating and landscaping. It also has art in the form of a large sundial.
Seating_Description: 10 tables with 20 movable chairs, 48 linear bench seats
Restrooms_Description: Must ask lobby attendant for key
Signage_Description: At both entrances. It does not have features listed on the sign. Does have the logo.
Landscaping_Description: Abundant flower planters, 6 shading trees, interesting paving and art, great views

Name: Commercial Street (235 Pine Entitlement)
Type: Snippet and lunchtime conversion. Commission was satisfied that it met the guidelines.
Location: Commercial street between montgomery and sansome
Description: Linear park improvements along Commercial Street feature various types of trees and concrete linear seating. These spaces are served by many cafés and restaurants along Commercial Street. Additional seating is provided during lunch hours.
Seating_Description: 8 public seats (bench and planter seats) and many temporary/restaurant seats

Name: 1 Market St
Location: Located along Mission Street at One Market Plaza entrance.
Description: Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.
Seating_Description: 16 small benches
Food_Service_Description: Several restaurants and cafes located within One Market Plaza, open M-F business hours
Restrooms_Description: Inside One Market Plaza at Mission St. entrance

Name: 444 Market  St
Description: Plaza with no seating.
Seating_Description: 8 movable chairs, 4 tables, 7 linear seats attached to 4 tables, ~50 ft. linear seating on statue ledge
Landscaping_Description: Trees create space definition but space is mostly hard paving

Name: 560 Mission St
Location: Plaza: NE side of building; indoor park/arcade along anthony st.
Description: This large plaza features a sculpture in a pool of water, a large bamboo grove, and various forms of seating. It is served by a cafe.
Seating_Description: 64 movable chairs with 15 tables. 134 linear seating on ledges. 30+ linear bench seats
Signage_Description: 3 signs. One was small on seat of ledge seating. Other was off to the side. One compliant sign on Jessie St entrance.

Name: Rincon Center
Location: In the courtyard between 1 and 2 rincon center
Description: This large plaza space is found in the interior courtyard between Rincon Center 1 and Rincon Center 2. It features several art sculptures and different types of seating.
Seating_Description: 78 on benches and chairs. Also, the café provides some of its own seating.
Landscaping_Description: Decomposed granite, trees in corners, minimal plants.

Name: 555 California St
Location: Located at the elevated plaza along California Street.
Description: NULL
Seating_Description: Yes- 24 small wooden bench seats located at elevated plaza's eastern edge.
Landscaping_Description: Tall grasses and shrubs, central pool surrounded by plants.

Name: 71 Stevenson St
Location: Accessible from Stevenson and Jessie St.
Description: The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.
Seating_Description: Evidence that there was seating during the day, but taken away before 5pm

Name: 333 Market St
Description: Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.

Landscaping_Description: 1 large tree and shrub planters, mostly concrete
